GapFillDragDrop.Title: Narrative tenses
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the words and drag them to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 She remembered him because years ago he had given her a beautiful necklace.
2 His hands were red and raw because he had been giving massages to the team all morning.
3 One by one the karate fighters crashed to the ground; they were being given a lesson by the master.
4 You gave me a shock just now!
5 In the middle of the recital, the pianist realised he was giving the greatest performance of his life.
6 After he died, we discovered that he had been writing a long book which he would never finish.
7 The thief found my PIN number because stupidly I had written it on the back of my credit card.
8 Waiting outside the White House, we realised that history was being written even as we stood there.
9 None of the children noticed the teacher arriving because they were writing on the board.
10 Lou Caldwell wrote Hymns to the Living at the age of twenty, and it was published a year later.
